common.randomEnchantmentComment: Should the disenchanter select the a random enchantment on the enchanted item instead of the first one?
common.damageItemComment: Should the enchanted item be damaged during the disenchanting process?
common.resetCostComment: Should the enchanted item's anvil work cost be reset to zero when fully disenchanted?
common.costSliderComment: Sliding multiplier for the experience cost. Default is 3.
common.damagePercentComment: Percent of damage that should be done to the item on each disenchant. Default is 5.
